str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To forget, neglect. Middle voice from epi and lanthano; to lose out of mind; by implication, to neglect.
Love to strangers, hospitality. From philoxenos; hospitableness.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I entertain a stranger, (b) I startle, bewilder. From xenos; to be a host; by implication, be strange.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, which is used only as an alternate in certain tenses; to lie hid; often used adverbially, unwittingly.
